select * from (select rownum rn, to_char(room_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as room_date,a.room_part_id,a.room_part_state,a.part_id, a.room_code,a.room_part_name,a.room_part_phone,a.room_part_card,room_typename,a.room_livetime,b.room_typeprice, to_char(ROOM_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') as ROOM_TIME,a.room_typeid,a.room_sum from tb_room_part a join tb_roomtype b on a.room_typeid=b.room_typeid join tb_room c on c.room_code=a.room_code
and ROOM_PART_PHONE like '%'||#{ROOM_PART_PHONE}||'%'
and ROOM_PART_NAME like '%'||#{ROOM_PART_NAME}||'%'
and room_part_state = 1
and rownum < #{end}) t where t.rn > #{start}

select count(*) from tb_room_part
and ROOM_PART_PHONE like '%'||#{ROOM_PART_PHONE}||'%'
and ROOM_PART_NAME like '%'||#{ROOM_PART_NAME}||'%'
and room_part_state = 1
